text: Tell everyone the news! Hold up a sign and shout it out, don't hold back! Tell them, Babylon has fallen! Her50:2. Since here and in Revelation the city of Babylon is identified with the female pronoun, the allusion is maintained here. god Bel is humiliated; the power of her god Marduk is broken; all Babylon's idols are humiliated and their power is broken.
